name: ambala
text: Only the lure of Vegas will get them out of the house.

name: chaika
text:
"I've got Vivarin and a pistol!"
What more does anybody really need?

name: ralgnar
text: An old car, obviously.

name: max
text: You've got sass, kid.

name: wonelove
text:
He's channeling Einstein, man.
And he's saying
Screw you.

name: apocowarg
text: Lyle riding shotgun is a necessary.

name: invidious
text: And probably not just a figure of speech.

name: starch
text: a pack of cigarettes and a bible

name: ashbery
text: Nothing.

name: relaxing
text: Good fucking call.

name: paperorchids
text: good fucking call, T.

name: woodenteeth
text: Two bags of grass, seventy-five pellets of mescaline, five sheets of high-powered blotter acid, a saltshaker half-full of cocaine, and a whole galaxy of multi-colored uppers, downers, screamers, laughers... Also, a quart of tequila, a quart of rum, a case of beer, a pint of raw ether, and two dozen amyls.

name: octafish
text: Not that you need all that, but once you get into a serious drug collection it's hard to stop.

name: redjoker
text: and i always thought it was the tendency to push it as far as you can that produced above mentioned shopping list...

name: dtuba
text: Don't forget the grapefruit.

name: overmedicated
text: Ether.

name: spectre
text: Knowing Lyle, there's also a square-shaped bottle of booze lying around.

name: i_love_kate
text: Wide-mouth, too!

name: bassguitarbill
text: With a handle.  I'm serious.

name: bigtom
text: turth

name: vreeeee
text: In this, as in so many other things, Lyle adheres to the Hunter S. Thompson school.

name: salo
text:
Is Lyle more entusiasthic about going to Vegas, furthering Téodor's relationship or the possibility of vivarin and pistol usage?

Perhaps it is the combination?

name: em2
text: I really wish more had come of this.

name: tekende
text: Oh, Teodor. Someday you will learn that when a girl tells you you're "funny," it does not indicate that she wishes to bone you. Going down that road inevitably leads to the "Look, you're a nice guy, but..." dead-end.

name: puguglypress
text: (sob)

name: bobfreedom
text: "vivarin and a pistol" hilarious!

name: fermatprime
text:
The real question is, does she think he's "funny" because he likes long, deep kisses with the eyes wide open? Or for some other reason?

I hope it's the first.
